# iosxr_cli_alias (Data Source)

This data source can read the CLI Alias configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_cli_alias" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `aliases` (Attributes List) Alias name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--aliases))
- `config_aliases` (Attributes List) Config Alias name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--config_aliases))
- `exec_aliases` (Attributes List) Exec Alias name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--exec_aliases))
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.

<a id="nestedatt--aliases"></a>
### Nested Schema for `aliases`

Read-Only:

- `command` (String) Alias body with optional parameters e.g,(name) show $name
- `name` (String) Alias name


<a id="nestedatt--config_aliases"></a>
### Nested Schema for `config_aliases`

Read-Only:

- `command` (String) Aliased config command
- `name` (String) Config Alias name


<a id="nestedatt--exec_aliases"></a>
### Nested Schema for `exec_aliases`

Read-Only:

- `command` (String) Aliased exec command
- `name` (String) Exec Alias name
